html:
10.13.20  8:35 am   how do you not clear your throat?

      you could sing instead, as a distraction

10.13.20  7:37 am   10.8.20  2:56 pm
It's your process, why do you think you are currently not on a respectable pace?

      i use the 3 finger rule. if you don't do a thing fast enough for ANYONE TO EVEN BE AWARE YOU ARE DOING IT then it might be too slow

10.13.20  6:12 am   do the tunes you get stuck in your head always complement your emotions? 

      music CONTROLS my emotions

10.13.20  5:51 am   I really really need to be making songs regularly to feel okay but I also really need to figure out how to do good visuals for songs and I have no idea how to balance anything and all I do is throw tantrums and get nothing done

      this is good, pretty soon you will have thrown all the tantrums and there will be no tantrums left and then you will easily get to work because you ran out of tantrums to do

10.13.20  4:08 am   What is your favourite type of flower? 

      pine needle

10.13.20  3:59 am   What is your favorite type of paradox? 

      planet

10.13.20  2:57 am   any thoughts on geographical accuracy?

      the gold standard

10.13.20  1:46 am   Is flour made up of flowers, or are flowers made up of flour?

      they are both made from the floor

10.13.20  1:28 am   congratulations, the United States has discovered a brand new island and YOU get to name it! What is it called? (Please answer quickly as the island is sinking and it might take the rescue team a bit of time to get here)

      i have a company policy against naming islands i have never been to

10.13.20  12:30 am   do you think that you would be able to make an album as just a larger work? like write songs specifically for the album and to go in specific places in the album?

      if it's large enough to be an album, then it would be large enough to be much much more than an album

10.13.20  12:51 am   What is your opinion on overpopulation?

      that already is an opinion

10.12.20  11:45 pm   why is logic so nonsensical and sense so illogical

      to maintain a steady balance

10.12.20  10:09 pm   what are the limits of language

      you can't explain whether or not you can explain everything

10.12.20  9:08 pm   What is college?

      seems like some sort of happy vacation getaway

10.12.20  8:56 pm   how did you get to be so not-boring

      i have a machine that brings me treats every time i am interesting

10.12.20  7:48 pm   in your video what is love, you never mentioned that baby dont hurt me, dont hurt me, no more. is that bad or not bad?

      that line doesn't make any sense to me and i don't like it, and the third reason i didn't use that line is because it's someone else's song

10.12.20  6:40 pm   How would you deal with a Friend(TM) that's not-so-Friendly?

      be an enemy who is less of an enemy than most enemies

10.12.20  5:40 pm   what are you working on

      it's one of those songs where it has a music video also, to go along with the song. released as a video, and also as just the song so you can listen to it on-the-go if you prefer

10.12.20  4:34 pm   What's your opinion on British slang and spelling.

      bang on

10.12.20  3:53 pm   it already over a third through october, how does that make you feel

      horrible

10.12.20  3:53 pm   is the floor made of floor

      i was going to say no but now that i think about it yes

10.12.20  3:11 pm   have you ever considered composing music for a stage musical?

      if i can get the stage into a video, then that would help complete the picture

10.12.20  2:15 pm   Being self taught how did you learn to... do music? I don't so much mean technique just like how you developed such complex musical ideas.

      complex ideas literally grow on trees. take a look at a tree, and i think you will see what i mean

10.12.20  1:30 pm   What would a future song you will make require for you to consider it your favorite?

      be not made yet. if it's not made yet, i can aspire to unlimited heights. and that is exactly the kind of thing that is helpful for doing one's best work

10.12.20  1:04 pm   What's your origin story?

      went to the store,

10.12.20  1:02 pm   how do you come up with the witty answers that you do, answer these questions very frequently, AND manage to make really good shit at the same time? I'm a management mess and cant manage my work for the life of me, and want to know how someone like you does it.

      the first thing you wanna do is go a head and thrust yourself into a fit of rage thinking that you will never, ever, have enough time to do all the things you've imagined you can do

10.12.20  12:28 pm   bill, thoughts on lemons?

      i have never thought about lemons

10.12.20  11:03 am   you're type of music deserves its own genre, what do you think the name would be?

      bill wurtz, but then after thinking about it a little bit further i usually reconcile that all music should be in the same genre, which i would call 'music'

10.12.20  10:25 am   how to not be racist

      how about being a bassist

10.12.20  9:13 am   how do you compose a song?

      just use 1 note. that may narrow it down

10.12.20  8:27 am   Hey Bill, have been trying to get motivation for art. I like the idea of making art but there is also the making part of making art. Can you help me get motivated to get up and create something?

      when you get the idea of making art, what art do you think is in that idea

10.12.20  7:12 am   what's your opinion on the state of wisconsin

      perfect place to go when you are have either fallen out of favor with the government of north dakota, OR, fallen INTO favor with the government of the state of wisconsin. as you can see there's 2 sides to this

10.12.20  6:59 am   i know there's been a bit of a revolution in the videomaking department but are there any interesting new developments in the songmaking world?

      flipping heckford yesfam

10.12.20  5:27 am   Where is the one tree that every other tree is a part of?

      eArTh

10.12.20  5:23 am   how do you recommend taking responsibility for your actions?

      change your name to one of your actions. 'door opener', etc

10.12.20  5:20 am   how do you recover from your emotional highs and lows?

      MORE HIGHS AND LOWS how about some mediums

10.12.20  4:53 am   what kind of glasses do you prefer?

      lOoKiNg

10.12.20  4:09 am   Could consciousness be dark energy? The more time that goes by in the universe the more intelligent life exists, accelerating the expansion nearly exponentially! Copyrighted idea by me hands off :)

      from what i've heard, 'dark energy' is almost like a categorical name which scientists have given to all the remaining energy they don't understand. it's my understanding that as soon as they understand it they will probably stop calling it that ...... and it has also generally been my understanding that scientists still don't totally understand consciousness .......... or maybe they do actually, i haven't gone outside in a while, actually that's not true i go outside once a day but i don't typically see any scientists, so they could be way further ahead now, in all fairness

10.12.20  3:56 am   What's your favorite triangular shaped instrument?

      the time space continuum

10.12.20  2:46 am   How do you make good chord progressions?

      make a song

10.12.20  1:42 am   Hey, do you think I should learn to play the guitar or keyboard first? I feel like playing the guitar (rock guitar) too but with the keyboard you can make really cool melodies ... anyway, which one should I choose first?

      whichever one seems closer

10.12.20  12:38 am   do you like leaving your house?

      yes, which reminds me of another one of my hobbies which is going back into it

10.11.20  11:21 pm   what do you eat on your bagel

      nothing

10.11.20  10:06 pm   with regards to this question: https://billwurtz.com/questions/q.php?date=202010062234 if you need to name a zillion files but don't know what to name them, why not try numbering them consecutively? that seems like a better solution than keymashing and calling them things like jsadhflkj.png

      even better, i don't have to name them anything. they are automatically sorted by exact date/time, and they are also automatically named, with distinctive character strings sometimes including the date depending on the context. also some contexts include a categorical label in the name also, plus the timecode

10.11.20  9:59 pm   https://billwurtz.com/questions/random.php?

What were some of the other names you considered?

      randolph,

      maybe just one huge one

      moving around?

10.11.20  6:44 pm   what is your favourite soft drink (has to be fizzy)

      brand new update coming out of botswana this morning, it does not have to be fizzy

10.11.20  5:32 pm   What's your favorite fish?

      the stair fish. looks just like a staircase. it uses the stairs to reproduce. pushes the babies down the stairs

10.11.20  4:59 pm   hey bill, i have been trying to come up with something for some weeks like a comic, ideas have been coming and I have done alot of concept art but dialogue and framing stuff isn't going right. What should I do?

      how about doing some writing, without drawing anything
